newsitem.title: ESTONIA: ESTONIA-ESTIKO AND ROTAGRUP REACH AGREEMENT.
newsitem.headline: ESTONIA-ESTIKO AND ROTAGRUP REACH AGREEMENT.

text.p: Estiko and Rotagrup have reached a preliminary co-operation agreement to deepen their working relationship, Estiko said on Monday.
Estiko, a food packaging manufacturer and retailer, said in a statement that it has proposed that Rotagrup, a wholesaler, take 49 percent of the shares of Eesti Spar.
Estiko is the importer of Spar products and the preliminary agreement sees Rotagrup taking over the stocking of the non-food goods for the Spar chain.
The cooperation agreement plan aims for the Spar chain to hold 10-12 percent of the grocery retail market in Estonia by the year 2000.
